meta.content: This is the official website for the City of Hill City, SD. This site contains public information on meetings, agendas, minutes, forms, applications and other city services.

p.span:
Welcome to "The Heart of the Black Hills"! As Mayor of Hill City, it is my privilege to invite you to experience our breathtaking home. Whether you're planning a visit to the Black Hills, relocating to Hill City, or currently living in our beautiful western South Dakota home, we're delighted to have you here.
The Black Hills come to life in Hill City. Located here is the Black Hills Institute of Geological Research, the 1880 Train and some of the most breathtaking sunrises and sunsets you will ever see. You may have also heard about our other attractions, namely Mt. Rushmore, Crazy Horse and Custer State Park which are mere minutes away. The Black Hills National Forest surrounds us and offers hiking, biking, as well as ATV'ers dream trails.
Main Street is the hub for all your travel, residential, wishes and necessities. Our merchants provide anything from native art, sculptures, jewelry to groceries and hardware supplies - all of your needs right here in town. We also have many wonderful restaurants and other fun activities to choose from. You have definitely come to the right place for making these and many other adventures a reality!
Hill City, “The Heart of the Black Hills!”

*Any web site you visit by a link from this site is solely the responsibility of the vendor, merchant, or other party providing the site. Links that may be accessed via this site are for the convenience of browsers only. The content of, including materials and information contained on, any site to which you link from this site is solely the responsibility of the provider of that web site. Any transactions that you enter into with a vendor, merchant or other party listed in this site or linked from this site are solely between you and that vendor, merchant or other party. The City of Hill City is not responsible for any such third party content that may be accessed via this site. The City of Hill City does not endorse the content contained in these sites, nor the organizations publishing those sites, and hereby disclaims any responsibility for such content.

div.div: Hill City City Hall, 243 Deerfield Rd, Hill City, SD 57745, USA
The Common Council is the governing body for the City of Hill City. This group of elected officials sets policy and regulations for our community.
